commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Team Shop 'til You Drop is back!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Ughhh, it's so heavy my arms are gonna fall off.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Thanks for the help!

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: I-It was amazing... It was so bright, even at night... That must be why they call Tokyo the City of the Future, zura...

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: I'm pretty sure you're the only one who calls it that...

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: What's with all of this stuff? What on earth did you buy?

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: A whole bunch of candy and soft drinks!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: We got some cards too!

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: We didn't just come here for fun and games, you know.

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: Eli is absolutely right. Do not forget that we obtained special permission from Nijigasaki High School to stay over and edit through the night.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: I know... But you gotta take a break sometime!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Given that you've gone out of your way to buy a pack of cards, it is abundantly clear that you are not thinking of this as a break-time activity.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Oh, don't be such a wet blanket. We can't all be editing the footage at once and there's no fun in just sitting around staring off into space.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Besides, it's a sleepover at school! Who wouldn't get excited?!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: She's right. I'm giddy just thinking about how much space we have all to ourselves!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Yeah, Nico! Emma! I knew you'd understand me!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: That's it, keep the compliments coming. I know I deserve 'em.

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: Nico, you're an upperclassman. You should start acting like it.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: All the shackles are off at this time of night!

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: Is it just me, or is the school kinda creepy at night though?

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: Yeah, I'm kinda scared a ghost might pop up any second.

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Ghosts?!

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: D-Don't be silly! There aren't any ghosts around here!

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: R-Right. There's no way.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: But, you've heard that every school has seven mysteries, right?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: No, that itself sounds like a mystery to me. Who came up with that nonsense?

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Also, how could every school have the same seven mysteries?

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Wh-What are these "seven mysteries" you're talking about?

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: Oh, you don't know? Every school in Japan has seven mysteries that are passed down. Like, at night, there's an extra stair on the staircase! Stuff like that.

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: There are also stories about music room portraits whose eyes start moving, pianos playing on their own...

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: Don't forget the one about the anatomical model in the science room coming to life.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: You're kidding! That sounds like fun! So basically, little school fairies come out to play, right? I wanna join in on their games!

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: You're a life-saver, Emma... I like the way you think... They're all just fairies playing around.

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: I've decided that that's the real truth behind every mystery I'll ever encounter from here on out.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Well, in that case, why don't we hurry and finish editing so we can go on a little ghost hunt?

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Absolutely not!

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: That's a big NO from me, too.

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: Aw, but you said it'd be okay if it was just fairies playing around!

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: Zuramaru will protect you if anything does show up. Her family runs a temple so she can handle a ghost or two, no sweat.

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Don't forget Nozomi either! She's a shrine maiden!

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: Sorry to be the bearer of bad news, but I don't have that sort of holy power.

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: Me neither. And to temples, ghosts aren't monsters; they're just Buddha in a different form, zura.

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: In any case, no ghost hunting! The main reason we asked to stay the night at school is because our work might take a while to finish! We don't have time to waste.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: How's it going, Rinari?

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Hmm...

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: It might take a pretty long time. I want to use all the footage, so it's hard to cut it down.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Oh! You're definitely gonna use this footage of Aqours' dance practice, right?

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: You HAVE to keep that in.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Huh? You filmed us practicing?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I just happened to get some footage of you guys practicing on the beach early in the morning after our meeting in Numazu.

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: What?! You were there?! I had no idea...

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: You kept your presence hidden from me? Blasphemy! People of the shadows, no doubt!

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: No, just regular people.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Sheesh. I couldn't believe you were being so sneaky about it. You could've invited us along to practice with you.

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: We thought you might've been exhausted from the long trip over, so we decided to let you all rest.

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: I never expected that you would have been filming us... What other scenes should we include?

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Well, there is something I would really like to have included. Let's see...

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Here's how it turned out. What do you think?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: I think it's great! It's a promo video that gets you really excited just from watching it.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Yeah, I'm sure people will want to come to the festival after watching this.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: It was totally worth all of the hard work. I even teared up a little!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: So, does that mean we're all done then?

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: You betcha. Great work, everyone.

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: The sun's about to rise...

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: I'm so, so sleepy. I can't fight it anymore...

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: Me too... *Yawn*

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: *Snore*
